channel.title: Connection Problems
channel.description: My friend has a Macbook 10.6.4 and has problems connecting to his/her Linksys BEFW11S4 router with 1.51.02 firmware Anyone have a fix?

item.title: Connection Problems
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
click on: start, network and sharing center, change adapter setting, right click on network card, click properties, TCP/IP v4, properties, use the following IP address, type 192.168.1.121, 255.255.255.0, 192.168.1.1, DNS: 208.67.222.222, 208.67.220.220

sorry if I were a macfag I could probably help more

try installing custom firmware on the router, are you using wireless? change encryption to WEP or None and try again

Read full topic
